schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Medgar Evers Primary Academic Center
schools.school-summary: Medgar Evers Primary Academic Center, a public school located in Ford Heights, IL, serves grades PK-4 in the Ford Heights School District 169.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 3 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.

schools.name: Cottage Grove Upper Grade Center
schools.school-summary: Cottage Grove Upper Grade Center, a public school located in Ford Heights, IL, serves grades 5-8 in the Ford Heights School District 169.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 2 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
